text: Mayola Biboko (born 22 March 1985 in N'dalatando, Cuanza Norte) is a Congolese-Belgian footballer. == Career == ===Belgium=== Biboko began his career with "Le Club Social" in Liège He then left for JS Pierreuse and played with players likes Rachid Tiberkanine. He then played for C.S. Visé (or spells as Wezet) and scored 2 goals in 13 appearances in 2004-05 Belgian Second Division season. The club then relegated. He played once in 2005-06 seasonProfile at voetbalkrant and was left on loan to Royal Spa F.C. in January 2006,http://www.dhnet.be/dhjournal/archives_det.phtml?id=563495 then R.U.S. Bas–Oha in 2006-07 season. Biboko returned to Visé in 2007-08 season.http://www.dhnet.be/dhjournal/archives_det.phtml?id=729530 and was released by Visé in the summer 2008. ===Czech Republic=== On 10 July 2008 sold to Bohemians Střížkov. He played only five league matches in his first season before going on loan to SK Viktorie Jirny of Czech Republic Fourth Division Divize B (Group B) along with Abdoulaye Diarra during the season.SK Viktorie Jirny Profile He scored a goal against FK Teplice B. He then returned to Bohemians and played once in March 2009, a 1-1 draw with 1. FC Brno. He replaced Stanley Ibe in the last minutes. ===Luxembourg=== As of first half of 2009-10 season, he played for Bohemians Střížkov and joined in summer 2010 to FCM Young Boys Diekirch.Mayola führt Liste der Neuzugänge an ===Return to Belgium=== After one season was released by FCM Young Boys Diekirch and he returned to Belgium, who signed now with RFC Seraing. Biboko played a year with the club from Liége, before signed for RCS Verviétois.« Des gens chaleureux et ouverts » - lavenir.net === Position === It was reported Biboko can also plays defender roleTest-Marathon beim HFC/ Kommen gleich 6 Neue? but his usual position is forward. ==References== ==External links== * Mayola Biboko (Bohemians Praha) - informace Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Belgian people of Democratic Republic of the Congo descent Category:C.S. title: Mayola Biboko
